content:
I am trying to print line breaks in a Python Django template. I have a dictionary which contains line breaks like this:
```python
{'quotes': u'Live before you die.\n\n"Dream as if you\'ll live forever, live as if you\'ll die today"\n\n"Love one person, take care of them until you die. You know, raise kids. Have a good life. Be a good friend. Try to be completely who you are, figure out what you personally love and go after it with everything you\'ve got no matter how much it takes." -Angelina Jolie.'}
```
I want to display the template with those line breaks. I've tried using the following code:
```python
{{quotes|withlinebreaks\n}}
```
But it's not working. How can I print line breaks in the Python Django template?

To display line breaks in a Django template, you can use the `linebreaks` or `linebreaksbr` filter provided by Django's template system. These filters convert line breaks in your text into HTML `

` or `
` tags, respectively. Here is how you can use `linebreaksbr` to achieve your desired output: First, ensure your dictionary is passed to the template context in your view: ```python # views.py from django.shortcuts import render def quotes_view(request): context = { 'quotes': u'Live before you die.\n\n"Dream as if you\'ll live forever, live as if you\'ll die today"\n\n"Love one person, take care of them until you die. You know, raise kids. Have a good life. Be a good friend. Try to be completely who you are, figure out what you personally love and go after it with everything you\'ve got no matter how much it takes." -Angelina Jolie.' } return render(request, 'your_template.html', context) ``` Then, in your Django template, use the `linebreaksbr` filter: ```html {{ quotes|linebreaksbr }} ``` With `linebreaksbr`, each newline (`\n`) in your text will be converted to a `
` tag, preserving the line breaks in the HTML output. If you want the text to be wrapped in `

` tags instead, you could use `linebreaks`: ```html {{ quotes|linebreaks }} ``` This will wrap paragraphs separated by double newlines in `

` tags and convert single newlines to `
` tags. Choose the filter that best suits your needs based on how you want the line breaks to appear in your rendered HTML.
